synopsis.text: She's a prodigious inventor, Nanoca Flanka, dispatched to the once-thriving maritime city of Tristia, now a mere shadow of its former glory following a devastating dragon attack. Her mission: to rejuvenate the struggling economy. Armed with her mechanical golem, Tenzan, and a wolf-like artificial creature, Stuka, Nanoca is eager for a challenge, and the golem competition offers just that. But winning isn't a given, especially with her self-declared rival, Panavia Tornado, vying for the title. Will Nanoca and Tenzan triumph, or will Panavia snatch the victory? The stage is set for a thrilling showdown in this captivating anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
